title: email hacked
body: my email got hacked and i cant changed the email to changed after my password please help me :)

replies.body:
Don't worry, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which will allow you to submit an email you do have access to.  Our account team can help recover the account and update your info.  

In the meantime, I recommend going over our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) for some safety practices to secure your info.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
